original_text: Do not have sex with a woman at the time when she bleeds each month. She is unclean during that time.
korean_text: 너는 여인이 월경으로 불결한 동안에 그에게 가까이 하여 그의 하체를 범하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Do not have sex with a woman
at the time when she bleeds each month
She is unclean during that time
